chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
items.plainText: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.

items.text: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
items.plainText: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.

items.text: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
items.plainText: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.

items.text: Do good, O LORD, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
items.plainText: Do good, O LORD, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.

items.text: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
items.plainText: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
